pkgmetadata.longdescription: Merge-Split Samplers for Conjugate Bayesian Nonparametric Models // Markov chain Monte Carlo samplers for posterior simulations of conjugate Bayesian nonparametric mixture models. Functionality is provided for Gibbs sampling as in Algorithm 3 of Neal (2000) DOI:10.1080/10618600.2000.10474879, restricted Gibbs merge-split sampling as described in Jain Neal (2004) DOI:10.1198/1061860043001, and sequentially-allocated merge- split sampling DOI:10.1080/00949655.2021.1998502, as well as summary and utility functions.
